userJourneys.name: Browse All Characters
userJourneys.description: View the complete list of available superhero characters
steps: User opens the application at http://localhost:3000/
Application loads and displays 50 characters in a table
User sees hero section showing 50 Characters and Marvel & DC Universes
User scrolls through the table viewing character names with icons
User views publisher information (Marvel Comics or DC Comics)
User views alignment badges (good/bad/neutral)
User views total power scores and action buttons

userJourneys.name: Search for a Specific Character
userJourneys.description: Find a character by typing their name in the search field
steps: User is on the homepage with all 50 characters displayed
User clicks into the Search characters textbox
User types spider into the search field
Application filters results in real-time
Character count updates to Found 1 characters
Table shows only Spider-Man

userJourneys.name: Filter Characters by Alignment
userJourneys.description: View only villains (bad characters) using the alignment filter
steps: User is on the homepage
User clicks the All Alignments dropdown
User selects Bad from the options
Application filters the table
Character count updates to Found 14 characters
Table displays only villains with red bad badges

userJourneys.name: Sort Characters by Power Level
userJourneys.description: See which characters are the most powerful by sorting the list
steps: User is on the homepage with characters displayed
User clicks the sort dropdown
User selects Power (High-Low)
Table immediately reorders by power
Thanos with 583 power appears at the top
Lower powered characters appear at the bottom

userJourneys.name: View Detailed Character Information
userJourneys.description: Learn everything about Spider-Man by viewing detailed character modal
steps: User is on the homepage
User locates Spider-Man in the character table
User clicks the Details button in Spider-Man row
Modal opens displaying comprehensive information
User views Biography (Full Name, Alignment, Publisher, Place of Birth, First Appearance)
User views Total Power: 446
User views Power Stats with visual progress bars for Intelligence, Strength, Speed, Durability, Power, Combat
User views Appearance (Gender, Race, Height, Weight)
User views Work (Occupation, Base)
User views Aliases
User clicks the close button or clicks outside the modal
Modal closes and user returns to the character list

userJourneys.name: Compare Two Characters
userJourneys.description: Find out who would win: Thanos vs Joker by using the comparison feature
steps: User is on the homepage
User filters by alignment Bad to see villains
User clicks Compare button on Joker row
Button changes to Selected
Compare Selected button updates to (1/2) and remains disabled
User clicks Compare button on Thanos row
Second button changes to Selected
Compare Selected button updates to (2/2) and becomes enabled
User clicks Compare Selected (2/2) button
Comparison modal opens displaying winner banner and stats
User views side-by-side power display
User views stat breakdown showing all 6 comparisons
User reviews the comparison analysis
User clicks close button to close modal
Modal closes and selection is cleared
